General.Name: bet-at-home.com AG
General.Description: bet-at-home.com AG, through its subsidiaries, provides online gambling and sports betting services in Europe. The company offers sports betting and live betting; online casinos; poker; virtual sports; and sport books. It operates in Germany, Austria, Malta, and Gibraltar. bet-at-home.com AG was founded in 1999 and is based in Düsseldorf, Germany. bet-at-home.com AG is a subsidiary of BetClic Everest Group S.A.S.
